name: Love is Sacrifice
description:
Love is sacrifice is a story of Liam, lonely man who seeks love. He is ready to sacrifice all he has only to be loved.

Love is Sacrifice is point-and-click game. It’s my first game on Ludum Dare ever! All interactions are made with clicking LMB or RMB. To exit game you should press ESC key. If you find any problems with my game feel free to contact me at wysu96@gmail.com!
